Another two men have been arrested on suspicion of murder after a man's death following a fight involving up to eight men.

Write a short summary for the following passage:
Dominic Doyle, 21, from Denton, Greater Manchester, died from stab wounds in hospital on 7 June after police were called to a report of a brawl.
An 18-year-old man from Openshaw and another man, 41, from Denton, were arrested on Tuesday.
A 15-year-old boy and a man, 18, are also being held on suspicion of murder.
Another man, 21, has been released without charge.
Det Ch Insp Ian Crewe, of Greater Manchester Police, appealed for witnesses who were near Hughes' pub on Manchester Road, Denton, in the early hours of Sunday.
Summary:
